Posts.Content: princess_22 wrote: I am 36 married and divorced 8 years ago with no children and been sexually active.I ve been having pain in my right breast and slight burning sensation on nipple though I read few articles on Internet on which they mentioned how to self examine if there's a lump or not, and I didn't feel any lump but the pain is still persistent from last one and half month. I feel pain when bend or sleep side wards on right side or if I push breast from right side towards left. I was taking contraceptive pills from 2 months ( femilon ) 1st month and ( Diane 35) 2nd month. can any one advise or direct me on this matter as I am worried. Log in to post a reply
